executable.title: Compare Tracts
executable.description: This program will halt with a status code indicating whether a test tract is nearly enough included in a standard tract in the sense that every fiber in the test tract has a low enough sum of squares distance to some fiber in the standard tract modulo spline resampling of every fiber to a fixed number of points.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

float.name: closeness
float.description: Closeness of every test fiber to some fiber in the standard tract, computed as a sum of squares of spatial differences of standard points
